price: Na hakika juu yako ipo laana mpaka Siku ya Malipo.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
footnotes: Na Mimi nimekwisha kuhukumia ubaidike na rehema na utukufu mpaka Siku ya Kiyama, Siku ya Hisabu na Malipo. Na hapo ndipo utapo pata adhabu, wewe na wanao kufuata .

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
